post.body: It's funny how these things come back around isn't it?
and @Urban_Lindsay Yokozuna Teriyaki is also owned by Shanaz from Shige! She's fantastic!
Your mom goes to College.
http://twitpic.com/rpsv - It looks gorgeous!
Best Breakfast: The Usual w/avocado (shared with a good friend) and a Bowl of Soul (to stay) at Java... mmmm...
Pretty things you will like: http://www.rubylane.com/shops/preciousandrarepieces
I'm dragging @ryanwoodings to the Basque Choir's Christmas program tonight if you'd like to join :)
I needed a change of scenery! Java in the am (cozy) and TH in the pm (lively). Welcome to my office...
Where would the gov't (largest employer in Boise) be without detail people to frustrate the big picture folks?
I'm at Java, but getting HUNGRY and could relocate for lunch!
Stevilfest was so much fun! Who knew that an entire party could be thrown around one Rock Band playing doctor?
Suggestion 1: get hotel sponsorship from @modernhotel for our out of town guests. I not only suggest, I help too!
It would be so much fun! Maybe we could get a lodging sponsorship from @modernhotel for our PDX friends...
Yes! @ryanwoodings and I were at the Basque Christmas concert. It was so lovely!
Heck yeah! I have your Jan. 23 show on the calendar. Will Teresa be there?
I wish you were playing the MetaGeek Christmas party tonight! That would have been fantastic :)
Whatever I do decide to present on, it better be as good as the Hasselhoff Conspiracy. I will accept suggestions :)
Yay! My favorite tattooed mom-blogger, @camikaos, presented at Ignite Portland 4! 3.19.09 is now taken :)
Twitter and Follow-up! There are two pearls for you :) Oh, and don't be weird or creepy. So, three.
Bettie Page as photographed at a Playboy Mansion party a few years back. Still had the bangs! http://icanhaz.com/bettie
Ooooh, I want to go to your cool Finnish party! Can we have a Finnish Party Night when you're here in Boise?
Bettie Page RIP? Worst news all week :( My dad will be devastated!
Just so you know, @kickstand is some guy in Seattle... DON'T GO!!
Welcome to your new urban 5-door hatchback ;)
Yay!
It's settled! Rocker-theme sushi tweet-up w/@ryanwoodings, me, @superhootie and @Geekdom tomorrow night! Who else is in?
If you're a Lita Ford girl and want a sushi tweet-up, I like where your head is at!
Well I don't know @superhootie, but if she's anything like Lita Ford, I recommend the boots @Gunstar found!
http://twitpic.com/ty3n - The Kewpie Doll of the Future!!
No! I <3 my QWERTY, okay?
just took the big annoying chrome clothes rack away! Now he has someplace to hang his clothes :)
is the best man-friend and a complete angel :)
we brought our own champagne to the Trolley House! FTW! No wait!
What did you catch on fire?
You are now the hero of some of the 6th and Main bartenders. I mentioned your "3 ingredient" tweet :)
Thank you! I will be ordering a Ketel One and soda, please :)
So you're saying the name of the liquor should be in the drink title? Vodka(mixer), Gin and (mixer), Whiskey (mixer) or beer?
Agreed! "A Christmas Story" was watched yearly growing up, now the High clan is on to "Elf". Buddy just does it for us!
I have never been drunk in that airport before, I swear. (nudge, wink, nudge) Hope you get out soon!
I love white paper analysis! Yay!
at Java after a good coffee and chat with @jessflynn and partner Steph. I'll shut up because everything I want to say will sound brown-nosey
I'm completely obsessed with this website, http://bobedre.dk/ Need to learn Danish, please! Love the pictures soooo much.
Keeping up with the renewable business: on a Western Climate Initiative conference call. Thank goodness for rollover minutes!
Breakthrough Institute inspiring blog of the day: Stim-novate our way to economic recovery!! http://tinyurl.com/5hy2sq
Mmmmm, my stepmom makes the BEST pie crust ever! The cinnamon and peaches were pretty tasty too :)
http://twitpic.com/rk92 - At St. John's for choral music. Sweet!
A Blue Moon makes a delicious pre-dinner snack. Quite filling!
At Thomas Hammer with a belly full of Pie Hole (eaten in the company of @LGM1)
Seriously, why are you reading to your child at Java? Your volume is no match for BB King.
Blinging my tattoo in preparation for Santa Rampage.
Just sent materials for the most timely non-profit position I could have ever hoped for... fingers crossed!
In a cover letter for a non-profit, better to go with "Dear Ms. So and So," or "Dear Sally," ? Does it even matter?
RT @WyattWerner Pronetos is bacolicious! http://is.gd/czmZ (@ryanwoodings and I were just talking bacon-wrapped...mmm)
Who is the real-life organizer of @Boise_Tweetup? Most of us are pretty good at tweeting ourselves up ;)
Shige at 8:30? @ryanwoodings and I love the sushi joint that never disappoints! Yes, @jessflynn, bring non-twitter Kevin please :)
Disappointed that it didn't seriously dump snow :(
Just got done with the NENA Lantern Parade (cute!) and now on to the never ending apartment junk. Ugh.
My lovely MetaGeek @ryanwoodings is granting my unreasonable request in exchange for Big City takeout!
Unreasonable request: Tweeps, help me fix this! Not good enough with Windows to do it http://icanhaz.com/bbhelp Will travel w/in reason!
Don't snow too hard please! I have a meeting in W. Boise in 2 hours!
This is what I have to do to my BlackBerry: http://icanhaz.com/dbb Wipe and re-install. Ouch!
Dead BlackBerry. Red light flashes hourglass appears/disappears. Tips on resurrection? (Besides buying an iPhone)
Really enjoyed the @techboise event last night! Great to meet new people and have at least my reasonable requests granted :)
Headed to Trip Taylor Bookseller for children's books to benefit St. Lukes toy drive @TechBoise tonight!
Thank you everyone for the well wishes and @superhootie for the ice pack!
Just busted my wrist at Bogus and headed to St. Als to see @superhootie!
Just packed my backpack for boarding tomorrow with @ryanwoodings. Heavier than it was on my month-long Thailand trek :)
At El Gallo Giro in Kuna with the Urbanites! Kuna doesn't quite know what to do with us and my enthusiastic Spanish :)
Is it so much to ask for brunch and a mimosa on New Year's Day? Listen up restaurant owners! 2 hour wait at Goldy's!
Time to prepare! Fine Italian cuisine with @Urban_Lindsay, then martinis and smooching in the New Year with @ryanwoodings! Happy NYE all!
Just got the coziest velour sweats and now contemplating the whole dressing up for New Year's thing...
RT @metageek Last chance to get $200 off the Wi-Spy DBx! http://tinyurl.com/3sq888 (It's so cool, even I am going to learn how to use it!)
Learned some important lessons tonight. The really hard way.
I'll shop around, but always go back to McU Sports for everything! Amazing service gets me every time. Bright white goggles and mits FTW!
Nevermind, Play it Again moved a couple of blocks away... My mistake. And theirs for not having a sign on the old location.
Tried to go to Play it Again Sports but it's closed :( so much for re-use! Gotta go new.
